name: Communist Dropout (Jasmin Heinemann)
description:
An endless runner made in the context of the Berlin Mini Game Jam April 2015.

As a challenge everyone swapped roles and tried something new.

Team Job Swap Squad

Allan Cudicio - Game Designer as 2D Artist
Raphael Koller - 3D Artist as Programmer/Level Designer
Samir Riecke - Artist as Producer/Game Designer
Dennis Lieu - Programmer as 3D Artist
Jasmin Heinemann - Game Designer as 2D Artist
Chika - Programmer
Viktor Pekar - Programmer as Music & SFX Designer
